data.title: The Royal Danish Opera
data.meta_description: The Royal Danish Opera is a home for the unmatched live experience of opera and symphonic music. We welcome artists and ideas from all over the world and export art made in Denmark to the world.
data.text:
The box offices at The Royal Opera House, The Royal Playhouse and The Old Stage are only open on days with performances, from 2 hours prior to the performance.

The Royal Danish Theatre Box Office

kundeservice@kglteater.dk

Tel. +45 33 69 69 69

Opening hours for telephone inquries:

Monday-Friday 9:30 AM to 4:00 PM

Closed Saturday - Sunday and Holidays
